WidgetInfo.Description: This is a widget which can generate a report based on map selection
WidgetInfo.Label: SelectionReport
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click to generate a selection report

Parameter.Name: ReportFormat
Parameter.Description: The format of the report file.
Parameter.Label: Report Format

Parameter.Name: FileName
Parameter.Description: The name of the report file.
Parameter.Label: File Name
